cons: Battery requires more than an hour to recharge

customer_reviews.title: Stacks up in Extreme Conditions!

I was particularly impressed with the quality of the gryo stabilization to produce steady video results even in wind (although using the drone in high wind is not recommended). We actually used this unit on an expedition in the Arctic where equipment failure is a common occurrence. This was not the case with this state of the art tool, I HIGHLY recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: It uses wifi to connect to what ever your use a tablet or smart phone not a usb cable
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am given four stars is the set up. It uses wifi to connect to what ever your use a tablet or smart phone not a usb cable. Had to contact dji support to find out how to connect my tablet to the camera. This also means if you are someplace where you do'nt have wifi you can't connect to the camera. I had to take a wifi router with me to fly in the field away from my house. Other than all that flies great an great vidio an good flight range.

product_meta.title: DJI Phantom 3 4K (White/Gold)
product_meta.description: Built from the ground up for aerial filmmaking and photography, the Phantom 3 4K from DJI features an integrated 12MP camera attached to a 3-axis gimbal. Apart from 12MP JPEG or RAW photos, the camera can record cinema-spec DCI 4K (4096 x 2160) at 24 fps and UDH 4K (3840 x 2160) at 30 fps. With the included flight battery, the quad copter can fly for up to 25 minutes, depending on conditions. A 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi link with range extender allows you to use the venerable DJI Go app for live HD monitoring and camera control. Additionally, you can access intelligent flight control features tailored to needs of the filmmaker, including Follow Me, Course Lock, Home Lock, and waypoint navigation. The Wi-Fi extender as well as the included handheld controller (transmitter) feature a line-of-sight range of up to 3937'.
feature_bullets: Easy to Fly, Intelligent Flight System
